title: [Visual] Forecast Janna Visual Bug
body: Back of Janna's coat starts to shift shades of blue looks as if something is clipping. Bug is very common on newest patch. Can be recreated by getting tier two swiftness boots. Not sure if tied to the move speed or the boots.

replies.body:
Hey IMicrowavePuppys,

This is a known issue and if all goes as planned, should be resolved next patch.
